title: Former US President Trump hints at support for Florida ballot measure legalising recreational marijuana
content: Former President Trump is considering support for Florida's Amendment 3, aimed at legalizing recreational marijuana for adults. Trump stresses the importance of responsible legislation to prevent public nuisances, highlighting the inconsistency of criminalizing marijuana in Florida. Some Republicans, like Sen Rick Scott, oppose the measure due to personal experiences with addiction.
summary: Former President Trump is considering support for Florida's Amendment 3, aimed at legalizing recreational marijuana for adults. Trump stresses the importance of responsible legislation to prevent public nuisances, highlighting the inconsistency of criminalizing marijuana in Florida. Some Republicans, like Sen Rick Scott, oppose the measure due to personal experiences with addiction.

title: Shanshan nears Tokyo: Tropical storm forces thousands to evacuate, six dead in Japan
content: Thousands of people in Tokyo are evacuating due to tropical storm Shanshan, which has caused six fatalities and many injuries. Record rainfall and river warnings have disrupted travel, cancelling flights and halting train services. Although weakened, Shanshan's slow movement continues to impact Tokyo, keeping authorities on alert.
summary: Thousands of people in Tokyo are evacuating due to tropical storm Shanshan, which has caused six fatalities and many injuries. Record rainfall and river warnings have disrupted travel, cancelling flights and halting train services. Although weakened, Shanshan's slow movement continues to impact Tokyo, keeping authorities on alert.

title: 3 dead after small plane crashes into row of townhouses in Oregon, TV station reports
content: A small plane crash in Fairview, Oregon, killed three people and set several townhouses on fire. The twin-engine Cessna 421C went down near Troutdale Airport, causing a power line collapse and a separate brush fire. Authorities have not identified any emergency calls from the aircraft before the crash. Federal investigators are probing the incident.
summary: A small plane crash in Fairview, Oregon, killed three people and set several townhouses on fire. The twin-engine Cessna 421C went down near Troutdale Airport, causing a power line collapse and a separate brush fire. Authorities have not identified any emergency calls from the aircraft before the crash. Federal investigators are probing the incident.

title: ‘All for the sake of a political stunt’: Vice President Kamala slams Trump for his Arlington Cemetry visit
content: Vice President Kamala Harris criticised former President Donald Trump for his controversial visit to Arlington National Cemetery, accusing him of disrespecting sacred ground for political purposes. Trump posed with families of soldiers killed in Afghanistan, violating cemetery rules. The US Army confirmed a staff member was pushed aside for trying to stop Trump’s team.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris criticised former President Donald Trump for his controversial visit to Arlington National Cemetery, accusing him of disrespecting sacred ground for political purposes. Trump posed with families of soldiers killed in Afghanistan, violating cemetery rules. The US Army confirmed a staff member was pushed aside for trying to stop Trump’s team.

title: Fatman Scoop, US rapper, collapses on stage, dies
Meghan Markle regrets about her departure from Royal family: Expert
content: Meghan Markle is reportedly regretful about how her royal family exit unfolded in 2020, leading to backlash and controversies. Currently, she resides in California, working on business ventures including her upcoming lifestyle brand. Royal expert Kinsey Schofield notes that despite Harry's UK visit, Meghan is not expected to return to Britain soon.
summary: Meghan Markle is reportedly regretful about how her royal family exit unfolded in 2020, leading to backlash and controversies. Currently, she resides in California, working on business ventures including her upcoming lifestyle brand. Royal expert Kinsey Schofield notes that despite Harry's UK visit, Meghan is not expected to return to Britain soon.

title: Human remains found beneath neighbour's home charged in disappearance of California couple from nudist resort
content: Police are investigating the disappearance of a California couple from a nudist resort and found human remains beneath a neighbor's home. The neighbor, Michael Sparks, is charged with their murders. Stephanie and Daniel Menard were last seen on August 24. Authorities believe the remains belong to the missing couple, and they are under examination.
summary: Police are investigating the disappearance of a California couple from a nudist resort and found human remains beneath a neighbor's home. The neighbor, Michael Sparks, is charged with their murders. Stephanie and Daniel Menard were last seen on August 24. Authorities believe the remains belong to the missing couple, and they are under examination.

title: Donald Trump questions transgender acceptance at Moms for Liberty event
content: Donald Trump spoke at the Moms for Liberty event, questioning transgender acceptance and criticizing transgender women in sports. He advocated for restricting gender-affirming healthcare and criticized illegal immigration and school board policies. Trump also targeted President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris while sharing personal stories about his family and career, including his TV show "The Apprentice."
summary: Donald Trump spoke at the Moms for Liberty event, questioning transgender acceptance and criticizing transgender women in sports. He advocated for restricting gender-affirming healthcare and criticized illegal immigration and school board policies. Trump also targeted President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris while sharing personal stories about his family and career, including his TV show "The Apprentice."

title: Small aircraft crashes in residential area near Portland International Airport
content: On Saturday morning, a twin-engine Cessna 421C crashed in a residential neighborhood near Portland International Airport in Oregon. The crash caused significant damage, resulting in a fire and large plume of smoke. Emergency teams responded swiftly. Currently, there is no confirmed information on injuries or fatalities. Aviation authorities will investigate the incident.
summary: On Saturday morning, a twin-engine Cessna 421C crashed in a residential neighborhood near Portland International Airport in Oregon. The crash caused significant damage, resulting in a fire and large plume of smoke. Emergency teams responded swiftly. Currently, there is no confirmed information on injuries or fatalities. Aviation authorities will investigate the incident.

title: Watch: Trump mimics Musk; quips they 'can have a good hookup ... '
content: During the Moms for Liberty event in Washington, DC, former President Donald Trump humorously imitated Tesla CEO Elon Musk discussing rocket development, calling Musk a 'super genius' and mentioning his endorsement. Trump shared his appreciation for electric cars but noted issues with cost and range. Trump also hinted at another upcoming interview with the Tesla CEO after a recent one with Musk on X in mid-August. He also criticized Vice President Kamala Harris, referring to her as a 'defective person' and highlighting her limited media presence as a reflection of her qualifications.
summary: During the Moms for Liberty event in Washington, DC, former President Donald Trump humorously imitated Tesla CEO Elon Musk discussing rocket development, calling Musk a 'super genius' and mentioning his endorsement. Trump shared his appreciation for electric cars but noted issues with cost and range. Trump also hinted at another upcoming interview with the Tesla CEO after a recent one with Musk on X in mid-August. He also criticized Vice President Kamala Harris, referring to her as a 'defective person' and highlighting her limited media presence as a reflection of her qualifications.

title: At least 7 dead, dozens injured in bus crash in Mississippi
content: A tragic accident in Mississippi saw a bus veering off Interstate 20 and overturning, resulting in seven deaths, including a 6-year-old boy and his 16-year-old sister from Guatemala. Thirty-seven passengers sustained injuries and were hospitalized. The bus was carrying mainly Central American passengers. Authorities are investigating the cause of the crash.
summary: A tragic accident in Mississippi saw a bus veering off Interstate 20 and overturning, resulting in seven deaths, including a 6-year-old boy and his 16-year-old sister from Guatemala. Thirty-seven passengers sustained injuries and were hospitalized. The bus was carrying mainly Central American passengers. Authorities are investigating the cause of the crash.

title: Baltimore tech entrepreneur Pava LaPere's murderer sentenced to three life terms
content: Jason Billingsley, who pleaded guilty to the first-degree murder of tech entrepreneur Pava LaPere in September 2023, received three life sentences. Two will be served concurrently. Billingsley also pleaded guilty to attempted murder in a prior incident. Critics have questioned his early release from prison for a 2013 rape, prompting legislative changes in Maryland.
summary: Jason Billingsley, who pleaded guilty to the first-degree murder of tech entrepreneur Pava LaPere in September 2023, received three life sentences. Two will be served concurrently. Billingsley also pleaded guilty to attempted murder in a prior incident. Critics have questioned his early release from prison for a 2013 rape, prompting legislative changes in Maryland.

title: Watch: Trump's dance moves at Moms for Liberty event go viral
content: During the Moms for Liberty event, Donald Trump ended his appearance with a viral dance routine, sparking mixed reactions on social media. While some praised his moves, others expressed disapproval. He also criticised Vice President Kamala Harris, calling her 'defective' and questioning her limited media presence, to highlight her shortcomings, according to him.

He also criticised Vice President Kamala Harris, calling her 'defective' and questioning her limited media presence, to highlight her shortcomings, according to him.

title: Mary Trump condemns uncle Donald Trump's behavior at Arlington ceremony, slams lack of legal action
content: Mary Trump has criticized her uncle, Donald Trump, following an alleged altercation involving his staff at Arlington National Cemetery. On August 26, during a wreath-laying ceremony, Trump's staff reportedly tried to film a restricted area and pushed an Arlington employee. Despite a police report, no charges were filed. Trump’s campaign denied the allegations, attributing the incident to a misunderstanding. Mary Trump condemned the absence of legal action, calling her uncle a despicable narcissist.
summary: Mary Trump has criticized her uncle, Donald Trump, following an alleged altercation involving his staff at Arlington National Cemetery. On August 26, during a wreath-laying ceremony, Trump's staff reportedly tried to film a restricted area and pushed an Arlington employee. Despite a police report, no charges were filed. Trump’s campaign denied the allegations, attributing the incident to a misunderstanding. Mary Trump condemned the absence of legal action, calling her uncle a despicable narcissist.

title: Rare green dinosaur fossil discovered in Utah
content: Unearthed in southeastern Utah, a rare 150-million-year-old green dinosaur fossil, temporarily named 'Gnatalie,' was reassembled by the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County and is now exhibited in Los Angeles. This nearly complete sauropod, believed to be of the genus diplodocus, is 75 feet long and weighs five tons. The green hue is a result of volcanic activity that altered its bones. It will headline a new museum wing opening in November.
summary: Unearthed in southeastern Utah, a rare 150-million-year-old green dinosaur fossil, temporarily named 'Gnatalie,' was reassembled by the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County and is now exhibited in Los Angeles. This nearly complete sauropod, believed to be of the genus diplodocus, is 75 feet long and weighs five tons. The green hue is a result of volcanic activity that altered its bones. It will headline a new museum wing opening in November.

title: Watch: Philippines and Chinese vessels collide in South China Sea
content: China has accused a Philippine Coast Guard vessel of deliberately colliding with a Chinese ship in the South China Sea. The Philippines refutes the claim, alleging that the Chinese vessel intentionally rammed the Philippine ship multiple times. This incident adds to rising tensions over contested maritime areas, involving multiple regional players, including the US, Japan, and others.
summary: China has accused a Philippine Coast Guard vessel of deliberately colliding with a Chinese ship in the South China Sea. The Philippines refutes the claim, alleging that the Chinese vessel intentionally rammed the Philippine ship multiple times. This incident adds to rising tensions over contested maritime areas, involving multiple regional players, including the US, Japan, and others.

title: Grim survival tactic: Why is Namibia planning to kill over 700 animals, including hundreds of elephants and zebras
content: Namibia plans to slaughter 723 wild animals, including elephants, to provide food for almost half its population facing a severe hunger crisis caused by the worst drought in a century. The strategy also seeks to reduce risky human-wildlife encounters as both compete for dwindling resources amid the drought's intensification.
summary: Namibia plans to slaughter 723 wild animals, including elephants, to provide food for almost half its population facing a severe hunger crisis caused by the worst drought in a century. The strategy also seeks to reduce risky human-wildlife encounters as both compete for dwindling resources amid the drought's intensification.

title: State emergency declared in Greek port city after massive dead fish crisis
content: Volos in Greece is dealing with a state of emergency as large quantities of dead fish have accumulated in its port. Triggered by last year's floods, this crisis has significantly affected the local economy and tourism. Cleanup efforts are ongoing, and authorities are investigating to understand the situation better and prevent future occurrences.
summary: Volos in Greece is dealing with a state of emergency as large quantities of dead fish have accumulated in its port. Triggered by last year's floods, this crisis has significantly affected the local economy and tourism. Cleanup efforts are ongoing, and authorities are investigating to understand the situation better and prevent future occurrences.

title: Man arrested for assaulting Jewish students at University of Pittsburgh
content: At the University of Pittsburgh, a man attacked a group of Jewish students using a bottle near the Cathedral of Learning. Two students were injured and treated at the scene. The suspect has been arrested. The university is working with Jewish organizations to support the affected students, emphasizing that violence and antisemitism are not acceptable.
summary: At the University of Pittsburgh, a man attacked a group of Jewish students using a bottle near the Cathedral of Learning. Two students were injured and treated at the scene. The suspect has been arrested. The university is working with Jewish organizations to support the affected students, emphasizing that violence and antisemitism are not acceptable.

title: Japan lodges formal protest over Chinese vessel presence in Kagoshima prefecture
content: Japan has formally protested to China after a Chinese survey vessel entered its territorial waters near Kagoshima Prefecture without authorization. The vessel was detected early Saturday and stayed in the area for nearly two hours. This incident has intensified Japan's concerns about China's assertive actions and its increasing military ties with Russia.
summary: Japan has formally protested to China after a Chinese survey vessel entered its territorial waters near Kagoshima Prefecture without authorization. The vessel was detected early Saturday and stayed in the area for nearly two hours. This incident has intensified Japan's concerns about China's assertive actions and its increasing military ties with Russia.
